intro:
Is to Nullify a tragedy, or a blessing?
Are you ready to flip the world upside down, no matter the cost?
description:
To combat evil, you must use evil.
Ideals will do nothing to change the world.

■ A Nation of Neon Cities: Kumyo
Here, wealth is monopolized by a select few,
and unless one is born into privilege, the future is bleak.
With no other choice, the youth turn to the mafia, 
consumed by violent, crime-ridden conflicts.

■ A New Mafia Boss & The Friendships She Forges
Kroa is a young underground courier,
and the sole descendant of a once legendary mafia.
She had no desire whatsoever to become a mafioso,
but after meeting Lowd, the only other survivor,
she resolves to fight her way through the underworld.

■ Immerse Yourself in a Gripping Story
This game features a linear story with no branching paths per character.
An intense human drama unfolds against the backdrop of a city of neon lights, fraught with danger.
After clearing the main story, pursue a romantic ending with multiple characters.

■ A Thrilling Romance in a World Teetering on the Edge of Danger
Romance and the underworld don't typically mix.
But once you've tasted both the bitter and the sweet together, there's no going back.
Perhaps even stone cold mafiosi are capable of love...

■ A Colorful Cast
Inspired by "Romance of the Three Kingdoms," a multitude of unique characters appear.
With such a colorful cast, there's bound to be someone who catches your eye.

【Features】
・Fully voiced (excluding the protagonist)
・Protagonist name customization
・Jump through chapters
・Supports touchscreen controls

■ Cast
Yuuichirou Umehara/Ryota Suzuki/Jun Fukuyama/Shunichi Toki
Takeo Otsuka/Hana Shimano/Yusuke Kobayashi/Eiji Takeuchi/Kazuyuki Okitsu/Shinnosuke Tachibana/Kanehira Yamamoto/Kazuhiro Yoshimura/Taishi Murata/Mutsuki Iwanaka/Toya Shiraishi/Masaya Wada/Haruki Ishiya/Miho Ishigami/Kaito Muroi/Kanoko Akahori/Takumi Watanabe/Takara Inoue/Hayato Kaneko/Yuki Ito
